module.name: product_occurrence
module.keywords: module, product occurrence, part occurrence, quantified occurrence, function occurrence

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the characterization of occurrences in a product structure, of objects represented with the entity Product and its subtypes.
This edition incorporates modifications to the previous edition listed below.
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been split off into the new module generic_product_occurrence:
The following ARM EXPRESS declarations have been split off into the new module part_occurrence:

For upward compatibility the new module generic_product_occurrence is included in the new module part_occurrence and the module part_occurrence is included in this module by a USE FROM declaration. In addition, modifications have been made to the mapping specification, the MIM schema and the EXPRESS-G diagrams to reflect and be consistent with the modifications of the ARM.

inscope.li: identification of the occurrence of a product version in a product structure;
relationship of the occurrence of a product version with the definition of this product version it is derived from;
characterization of a product occurrence that is defined from a product specification;
characterization of the quantity of a product occurrence;
identification of the occurrence of a function;
specialization of the concept of product occurrence to represent occurrences of a part.

outscope.li: relationships with the functions or alternative solutions that a product occurrence provides a solution element for;
description of the use case of a part occurrence in a product family.
